title: Harry Styles shares steamy new video for Lights Up and fans can't get enough
text:

Harry Styles dropped his new single in the early hours of the morning - and predictably his legion of fans couldn't get enough.

The superstar released Lights Up to the world well before the sun was due to rise in the UK.

The video - revealed at 5am - shows the 25-year-old topless and surrounded by girls and guys with plenty of shots of his trademark cheeky grin to go with it.

The smooth song, his first single in over two years, was produced by Tyler Johnson and Kid Harpoon, who co-wrote the track with him.

The steamy video, filmed in Mexico, certainly hit the spot with his army of fans.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Twitter)

He sings: “All the lights couldn’t put out the dark/ Running through my heart/ Lights up and they know who you are/ Know who you are/ Do you know who you are?”

In less than a hour, his three pictures on Instagram were liked a combined total of 2.8million times.

Fans flooded twitter to react to the song with some saying it could be his biggest hit yet.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: WireImage)

"This is a masterpiece" one posted. "Lights up has easily become my favourite song ever," wrote another.

"This is not what I expected, it's just so much better - I'm speechless" one fan said.

Harry joked about calling his album Mushrooms And Blood after biting off a part of his tongue while high on hallucinogenic drugs.

He told the Rolling Stone magazine: “We’d do mushrooms, lie down on the grass, and listen to Paul McCartney’s Ram in the sunshine. We’d just turn the speakers into the yard.

“We were here for six weeks in Malibu, without going into the city. People would bring their dogs and kids. We’d take a break to play cornhole tournaments. Family values!”

It's probably a good job it's already gone down so well.

(Image: RollingStone/Instagram)

Niall Horan says the One Direction boys would have ended up killing each other if they hadn't split when they did.

The Irish singer, who is also due to release his second solo album, told The Telegraph : "It was incredible. But we got tired.

"Not tired of it, just tired out. I can never really remember any major bust-ups, just brotherly family nagging s****y arguments like that.

"But we were gonna gonna end up killing each other. We all sat down on day, had a chat and it was like, 'We need to take a break, chill out and try something new'."
description: The former 1D star has released his first track for nearly two years with Tyler Johnson and Kid Harpoon
